verbs.description: [ARG0: philly band the war on drugs] [V: wins] [ARG1: bruno mars sweeps] [ARGM-LOC: at grammy awards philadelphia - based] band the war on drugs won the grammy for best rock album during the 60th annual grammy awards on sunday night bruno mars won the most grammys with six wins dave chappelle kurt vile philly uzi vert grammy award philadelphia pasek and paul grammy awards bruno mars janelle monáe jeff lorber kendrick lamar
